content: Is there any mistakes in this text : This landscape is very beautiful. It’s gorgeous because there’s a lot of handsome colors. Also, the mountains in the back are apic, high and there’s snow on the mountain, but especially at the bottom of it. Furthermore, the mountains are rocky. Moreover, there’s a man sitting on the wooden stairs watching the view. In addition, there’s ten kayaks on the water, one at the right of the man, and there’s a very small pier at the left of the man. Besides, the sky is gorgeous, it’s a light blue with clouds. Finally, there’s a lot of trees at the bottom of the mountain.
